view.confirmpopupupdate: The application has to be reset for the changes to take effect.# Continue?
view.confirmtemplatedelete: Your are about to delete the template known as %TEXT%.
view.confirmtemplateerror: The file %TEXT% is either missing or its schema couldn't be validated.# The template will be removed now.
view.confirmtemplateexit: This template will override the existing one.
view.popupdirtooltip: This is the current work directory. Change it to set a new directory
view.popuplangtooltip: Change it to set a new directory
view.title: TRANSADÃ©
view.tooltipcheckboxclick: Left click to check. Right click to visualize the node.
view.tooltipdelete: Click here to remove the current item from the template list.
view.tooltipfilechooser: Left click to use the file chooser. Right click to type.
view.tooltipinfo: Click on this button for more information about the software.
view.tooltipopenreport: Check if you want to view the report file right after the computation.
view.tooltiprun: Click to run the selected transfers above.
view.tooltipsettings: Click to set the language and the report directory.
view.tooltiptemplatechoose: Choose one the previously saved templates.
view.tooltiptemplatetext: Left click to delete the current text. Right click to keep the current text.
view.tooltipview: Click to view the selected files.
view.warngoodtogo: The configuration parameters aren't properly set.# Check the settings section.
view.warnitemdelete: The item has already been deleted.#Please restart the application.
view.warnitemsuccess: The item has been successfully deleted.
view.warnpopupnoupdate: The updates couldn't be executed.# Please try again later.
view.warnpopupnoupdatecritical: Something seems not to proceed as expected.# Please contact the developer as soon as possible.# Name: Patrick Meppe# Email: tapmeppe@gmail.com
view.warnschema: No .xml file or xml file with a wrong schema selected!
